<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1129732_healthca.getCategory</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>getCategory</name><script><![CDATA[var getCategory = Class.create();
getCategory.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    getCategory1: function() {
        var sysid = this.getParameter('sysparm_buildingid');
		gs.addErrorMessage(sysid);
        var gr = new GlideRecord('x_1129732_healthca_medical_devices');
        gr.addQuery('sys_id',sysid);
        gr.query();
        if (gr.next()) {
            gs.addInfoMessage(gr.getValue("device_name"));
         
           
            return "ture";
        }



    },

    type: 'getCategory'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-12-18 10:12:06</sys_created_on><sys_id>1912a1fb474ff110eeeefb42e36d437f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getCategory</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Healthcare" source="x_1129732_healthca">94920d7247033110eeeefb42e36d430f</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Healthcare">94920d7247033110eeeefb42e36d430f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1912a1fb474ff110eeeefb42e36d437f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-12-18 10:29:21</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
